channel.title: Setting objects at different heights
channel.description: How would i do this? If you help ill rep if your not already maxed ;D

item.title: Setting objects at different heights
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:4, topic:432494”]Works for me and we basically use the same serber. if (c.heightLevel == 3) { // Ownerzone c.getPA().spawnObject(2213, 3113, 3161, 1, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(2213, 3113, 3160, 1, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(2213, 3113, 3159, 1, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(567, 3110, 3162, 0, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(3679, 3103, 3158, -1, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(3679, 3103, 3161, -1, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(13614, 3103, 3159, 0, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(10141, 3104, 3164, 0, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(9508, 3103, 3164, 0, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(6256, 3106, 3163, 0, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(4373, 3111, 3156, 0, 10); // End Ownerzone }[/quote]

It works for me now nvm thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Setting objects at different heights
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Works for me and we basically use the same serber. if (c.heightLevel == 3) { // Ownerzone c.getPA().spawnObject(2213, 3113, 3161, 1, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(2213, 3113, 3160, 1, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(2213, 3113, 3159, 1, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(567, 3110, 3162, 0, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(3679, 3103, 3158, -1, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(3679, 3103, 3161, -1, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(13614, 3103, 3159, 0, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(10141, 3104, 3164, 0, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(9508, 3103, 3164, 0, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(6256, 3106, 3163, 0, 10); c.getPA().spawnObject(4373, 3111, 3156, 0, 10); // End Ownerzone }

Read full topic
